content.title: Exciting News: Get a FREE $9.98 Derma Roller When We Hit 400 Backers!
content.creator:
Morfone
February 18, 2025
content.content:
Dear Valued Backers,
First and foremost, we want to extend our heartfelt gratitude to each and every one of you for helping us reach 200 backers on our Kickstarter journey! Your support has been truly inspiring, and we couldn‚Äôt have done it without you.
But this is just the beginning. We‚Äôre excited to announce a special challenge that will benefit every single backer if we hit our next milestone:
If we reach 400 backers in the next 17 days, we‚Äôll send a FREE $9.98 Derma Roller to EVERY supporter!
This high-quality Derma Roller is an incredible addition to your hair care routine, and we‚Äôd love to share it with you as a token of our appreciation for making this project a success.
How You Can Help:
Your support doesn‚Äôt stop at backing the project‚Äîspreading the word makes all the difference! Here‚Äôs how you can help us achieve this goal:
Share Our Project: Tell your friends, family, and social media followers about our campaign. The more people who know about it, the greater our chances of success!
Leave a Comment or Review: Positive feedback helps others discover why our product is worth supporting.
Encourage Others to Back: Every new backer brings us closer to unlocking the Derma Roller reward for everyone!
Let‚Äôs Work Together!
We believe in the power of community, and with your help, we‚Äôre confident we can surpass this milestone. Remember, the reward is not just for new backers‚Äîit‚Äôs for everyone who has already supported us too!
Thank you once again for being such an amazing part of our journey. Together, we can make this project even more successful and bring value to all of our supporters.
Stay tuned for more updates, and feel free to reach out if you have any questions or ideas.
The Morfone Team

content.title: Giveaway Alert - Win A FREE Minoxidil Topical Solution!
content.creator:
Morfone
February 6, 2025
content.content:
We are hosting a ‚ÄúComment & Share Giveaway‚Äù event to show our appreciation for your support! Be among the first 50 backers to participate in our event and receive a FREE Minoxidil Topical Solution.
To enter the giveaway, please follow the simple steps below:
Step 1: Share the Morfone Electric Minoxidil Atomizer campaign with your friends and family on social media. üì¢
                                                          Click on the icons to start sharing!
Note: You can also share projects through buttons below the project. Of course, you can use your most commonly used social media platforms to share.
Step 2: Leave a comment under the campaign discussion and let us know, "Why are you excited about the  Morfone Electric Minoxidil Atomizer?‚Äù Don't forget to include your pledge number and the link to your shared social post.
Please note that you must complete both steps to receive a full giveaway entry. The giveaway is on a first-come, first-served basis and is limited to the first 50 participants. 
In addition, this event is only open to the Morfone Electric Minoxidil Atomizer campaign backers. We will note your entry/contribution number and ship the prize with your reward at the time of delivery.
*A friendly reminder: please ignore the disclaimer that says "Rewards are not guaranteed". Our team at Morfone has a 100% delivery guarantee for our backers and you will only be charged when the campaign ends. üíØ
Thank you again and we are thrilled that you are joining us on this exciting journey! üëè
Cheers,
Morfone Team

content.title: A Heartfelt Thank You to Our Amazing Backers! üôå
content.creator:
Morfone
February 6, 2025
content.content:
Dear Valued Backers,
We are thrilled to announce that, thanks to your incredible support, we have successfully reached our initial funding goal of $8,492! üí™This milestone would not have been possible without each one of you. From the bottom of our hearts, thank you for believing in our project and helping us turn our vision into reality.
We are excited to bring you a brand new scalp care solution with our Minoxidil Atomizer. Designed to provide an innovative approach to scalp health, we believe this product will offer you an unparalleled experience tailored to your needs. We can't wait for you to try it out and witness the difference it makes in your daily routine.‚ù§Ô∏è
As we move forward, please know that our commitment to you doesn't end here. We are dedicated to providing all backers with the best possible after-sales service. Should you have any questions, concerns, or feedback, don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out. Your satisfaction is our top priority.
Moreover, we kindly ask for your continued support by sharing our project on your social media platforms. Spreading the word about what we're doing can help us reach even greater heights and bring this innovative scalp care solution to more people around the world.
Thank you once again for being part of this journey with us. Together, we can make a real difference!üöÄ
Warmest regards,
Morfone Team
